clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical In-hospital Evaluation of the Usefulness of a New Multi-detector Computed Tomography Scanner From Arineta Ltd
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical In-hospital Evaluation of the Usefulness of a New Multi-detector Computed Tomography Scanner From Arineta Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical evaluation of a new cardiovascular oriented CT scanner from Arineta Ltd.

detailed_description.textblock: The study will evaluate a new twin source relatively compact CT scanner with advanced technology which is optimized for cardiovascular imaging. Eligible patients with a clinical indication will undergo coronary or cardiac CT scans using the new SpotLight CT from Arineta Ltd. Image quality and usefulness of the new system will then be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Image quality (subjective) of the new SpotLight CT scanner from Arineta Ltd.
primary_outcome.description: Subjective (4 grade scale) image quality assessment of coronary arteries. unassessable studies and unassessable coronary segments will be reported.

primary_outcome.measure: Image quality (objective) of the new SpotLight CT scanner from Arineta Ltd.
primary_outcome.description: Image contrast, image noise, signal to noise ratio and contrast to noise ratio. Those numerical values will be reported to allow comparisons with values previously reported with other CT scanners.

secondary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic accuracy of the new SpotLight CT scanner from Arineta Ltd.
secondary_outcome.description: Performance characteristics of the new CT scanner for diagnosing obstructive coronary artery disease as compared to other reference standards such as invasive coronary angiography.

secondary_outcome.measure: The effect of cardiac CT results (with SpotLight CT) on patients triage
secondary_outcome.description: The effect of cardiac CT results on patients diagnosis and therfore hospitalization or discharge decisions

secondary_outcome.measure: The predictive value of cardiac CT results (with SpotLight CT) for patients outcome
secondary_outcome.description: Predictive value of cardiac CT results for adverse outcomes (death/myocardial infarction/revascularization).

arm_group.description: Patients eligible for cardiac CT will be included with a focus on symptomatic patients with low-intermediate risk for obstructive coronary artery disease. Patients will undergo Cardiac CT scanning (with the SpotLight CT).

intervention.intervention_name: Cardiac CT scanning (with the SpotLight CT)

study_pop.textblock: Patients with a clinical indication for cardiac CT

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Symptomatic patients with a clinical indication for cardiac CT
2. Patients with a clinical indication for CT
3. Estimated GFR > 60 mL/min
Exclusion Criteria:
1. No clinical indication for CT scanning
2. Contra-indication for CT scanning or for IV contrast administration
3. Pregnancy
4. Inability to give an informed consent
